title: 336: What Does it REALLY Mean to be Asexual?? + More with Ev’Yan Whitney
itunes:title: 336: What Does it REALLY Mean to be Asexual?? + More with Ev’Yan Whitney
description:
The Broads are joined again by the amazing sexuality doula, author, and sensualist Ev’Yan Whitney (she/they)! They chat about what has been happening in their life the past two years, their intentional time apart from their partner for a year, keeping your autonomy in a relationship and not losing yourself, being asexual, misconceptions about asexuality, how many of us are walking around not connected to our bodies, their new book “Sensual Self”, the importance of cultivating our sensual selves and what that really means, and so much more! 

 

EV’YAN WHITNEY:

Order “Sensual Self” HERE: https://www.evyanwhitney.com/sensualself

Sign up for Ev’Yan’s newsletter HERE: https://www.evyanwhitney.com/subscribe

Listen to Sensual Self Podcast HERE: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/sensual-self-with-evyan-whitney/id1124567779

Find out more info HERE: https://www.evyanwhitney.com/

Follow Ev’Yan on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/evyan.whitney/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
